body:
You can then use their design to create a prototype in Form Builder. 

To use the editor, you’ll also need:

* system account privileges on your computer equivalent to ‘developer’ at MoJ Digital – if in doubt, speak to your IT support
* a GitHub account

To deploy your service with the publisher, you’ll also need:

* to set up development, staging and live environments to host your service
* a digital.justice.gov.uk email account so you can log into the publisher
heading: Using Form Builder: what you’ll need
lede: Your service design team should have planned and designed how the online service is going to work, following [guidance in the GOV.UK service manual](https://www.gov.uk/service-manual/design/form-structure#design-your-forms-for-the-format-theyll-appear-in).
